attributes.action: Vaccinate covid 19 around the clock using retired NHS and volunteers to help
attributes.additional_details: The vaccination programme isn't going quick enough... this is costing lives and causing severe mental challenges for millions of people.  The NHS are already under pressure so let the public help where they can.  Around the clock administration would allow a much wider audience to be vaccinated quicker... please, we all need this to be over!
attributes.background: Start doing the covid 19 vaccination programme around the clock in order to reach more people quicker.  Millions of people would be willing to attend night appointments for the vaccine and thousands of people would be willing to help with admin etc. Ask retired nurses and doctors to help administor

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197

The NHS is already seeking volunteers, including retired clinicians, to join the NHS Covid-19 vaccine team and help with the vaccine rollout: https://www.england.nhs.uk/coronavirus/join-the-nhs-covid-19-vaccine-team/
